column4: Hi, I'm trying to convert a wav to flac using soundconverter on 5.10 - but it produces an empty file. Any ideas how to fix this?
make sure that the flac encoding library is installed.
Yup, libflac7 and libflac++5c2 are present
i've never used the soundconverter.. but i've had issues with converting stuff.. normally it is if the library is not present, or the app can't find the library's location.
